about_the_game:
This game is best described in 25 words:
It's a sci-fi roguelike auto battler where you command an intergalactic carrier, outfitting it with new spacecraft and technologies to take on other players asynchronously.

If I were forced to use more words and gifs then I'd probably say something like this:

.

Upgrade your Carrier with a wide array of deadly spaceships and weird and wonderful technology designed to obliterate anyone stupid enough to oppose you.

The position of cargo items can both trigger awesome combos with other cargo or combine to create entirely new technology.

Hundreds of unique items means, billions of combinations - and we’ve tested them all….honest, don’t look into it.



Engage opposing commanders in asynchronous multiplayer - because nobody wants to actually talk to other people online!



It’s not the size of your deck that matters, it’s also the shape.

Hire Crew to uncover derelict areas of your Carrier, who knows what tech you might reveal?

Then put them to work flying your starships, ensuring they stay on target.



Just like in real life, if you can emerge victorious 10 times before tasting defeat 3 times then you are crowned “awesome and better than 10 other people”.

Of course, in space, no one can hear you rage-quit, but we can see your win/loss stats!
